price: 33. Mise waxay leeyihiin: Waa been abuurtay (Qur’aanka)? Mayee! Ma rumeysna (Xaqa).
arabic: أَمۡ يَقُولُونَ تَقَوَّلَهُۥۚ بَل لَّا يُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: am yaqūlūna taqawwalahu bal lā yu'minūna
